name: The Cookie Puss Misadventures of Lennie
name_original: The Cookie Puss Misadventures of Lennie
description:
You, the Safety Patrol Agent, have been strucked by something. Something indecipherable, something that makes your heart go eurobeat.exe. This is what they call "love." Or I don't know, some visual novel I made using  renpy and Microsoft Paint. 

I mean, it's honestly something I make on my spare time. Plus it's a sp00ky in-joke but I mean, it is pretty top notch 100%. Like the soundtrack is pretty cool and the art is like superb (at least, to my standards) So uh yeah, enjoy spending the next 5-10 minutes playing this.
